title: [Self-Directed] Online Instructional Design Expert Training Program for Gerontology Education Program Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic gerontology knowledge and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Focus on strengthening online educational content development capabilities while maintaining adult learners' participation motivation

learning_goals: Learners can apply a curriculum design framework for gerontological education based on adult learning theory.
Learners can develop educational materials that integrate effective interaction elements in online learning environments.
Learners can devise assessment strategies to promote learner engagement in asynchronous learning environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
